details.summary: OpenAI seeks to remove a clause about AGI from its Microsoft contract to facilitate further investments.
Xbox is at a crossroads at the end of 2024, suggesting uncertainty about its future direction.
RomCom exploits zero-day vulnerabilities in Firefox and Windows, indicating a security risk.
AI data centers are causing potential power supply shortages in North America.
A compact update on AI includes information on ChatGPT, power supply issues, Meta Apollo, and Nvidia.
Xbox Indie Game Fest Demo Event is announced.
Armored Core players are handling cheaters effectively, highlighting the game's competitive community.
A look back at the 30th anniversary of Netscape Navigator 1.0, a browser that revolutionized the internet.
A demo version of 'FANTASIAN ND', a game with a diorama-style world, has been released.
Snoop Dogg's Xbox collection and year in review are highlighted.
Meta Platforms is challenging OpenAI's shift to a for-profit model, potentially creating competition in the AI space.
AI startup Perplexity closed a funding round at a $9 billion valuation, indicating a strong interest in AI startups and potential future competition for Alphabet.
Canada's antitrust watchdog is suing Google, seeking a breakup of its ad tech business, which could negatively impact Alphabet's revenue.
A judge is expressing skepticism about Google's arguments in the ad tech case, increasing the risk of a negative outcome for Google.
GM is retreating from robotaxis and stopping funding for its Cruise autonomous vehicle unit, which may impact Waymo's competitive landscape.
An analysis suggests that Alphabet stock has room to increase in value, indicating potential upside.
Waymo robotaxis are starting road tests in Tokyo, marking their first overseas expansion and a positive step for the company's autonomous vehicle efforts.
GE Vernova will power data centers with gas as AI demand increases, indicating growth in data center infrastructure and potentially positive indirect impact for Alphabet.
The article lists trillion dollar companies in 2024, without further analysis.
An article discusses whether Google might sell the Chrome browser to Alphabet, a potential restructuring move.
NVIDIA's supply chain is boosted by strong orders from Vishay for AI servers and RTX 50 series.
NVIDIA is considered among the best stocks to buy for long-term growth based on a specific indicator.
NVIDIA is under investigation by the U.S. Commerce Department for allegedly smuggling AI chips to China.
News update including topics like ChatGPT, power supply, Meta Apollo, and Nvidia.
An analyst with a high accuracy rate predicts a significant upside of over 30% for Nvidia stock.
Nvidia, Intel, and EQTY Labs are working on on-silicon real-time AI compute governance.
The article discusses whether Bitcoin or Tesla is better, using AI for financial analysis.
Intel releases a new graphics card, the Arc B580, for 1440p resolution.
Apple is collaborating with NVIDIA.
Schneider Electric launches AI-Ready data center solutions and collaborates with NVIDIA on new data center reference designs.
OpenAI hires three top engineers from DeepMind, a potential loss for Google's AI efforts.
Apple is utilizing AWS AI chips for pretraining Apple Intelligence, showcasing a collaboration with Amazon Web Services.
Apple's investment in the UK has surpassed £18 billion, supporting 550,000 jobs, including critical engineering roles.
Apple is notifying Apple Pay and Wallet users of changes to their terms of use.
Apple announces the winners of the 2024 App Store Awards.
Adobe Lightroom and Balatro+ are among the apps honored in Apple's App Store Awards.
A sponsored post for CoverSutra.
Apple announces the 17 winners for the 2024 App Store Awards.
The next Apple Watch Ultra may include a life-saving upgrade.
Tim Cook and other CEOs met with China's premier to discuss potential issues with Trump plans.
NVIDIA's supply chain is boosted by strong orders from Vishay for AI servers and the RTX 50 series, indicating positive demand for related technologies.
Turkey is seeking to resolve the F-35 purchase deadlock with the US, potentially impacting future defense contracts for RTX.
Intel is releasing a new graphics card, the Arc B580, targeting 1440p resolution gaming, potentially increasing competition in the graphics card market.
An article suggests that RTX Corporation is undervalued and is a potential buy for investors, citing hedge fund interest.
NVIDIA is set to release the RTX 5090 GPU with AI capabilities at CES 2025, targeting professionals, indicating advancements in GPU technology.
Raytheon, a subsidiary of RTX, has been awarded a contract for NGJ-MB pod production, suggesting continued revenue streams.
Nvidia leads US semiconductor stocks in AI-driven growth, highlighting the semiconductor industry's strong performance.
Intel's new Arc B580 GPU with Xe2 architecture is reviewed, highlighting significant performance improvements.
US defense stocks are declining along with gold and oil futures, indicating a potential downturn in the sector.
The article discusses why GeForce RTX graphics cards are good gift choices for gaming and advanced AI, highlighting consumer demand.
